Package de.espirit.firstspirit.access.editor

Interface SiteStoreVariableValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EditorValue<String>
    public interface SiteStoreVariableValue
extends EditorValue<String>
    Tag for editor values working on sitestore variables. Contains old, deprecated API for compatibility.
    Since:
    2.3.17
